contents:
CCTV海外版的英文“辟谣”
https://news.cgtn.com/news/2020-04-20/China-dismisses-rumors-claiming-its-citizens-were-arrested-in-Guinea-PQGaSyfDNu/index.html

不过确实没欧美主流媒体跟进。稍微大一点的媒体只有菲律宾媒体GNN利比里亚分部的报导，网站看上去很破：
http://gnnliberia.com/2020/04/18/guinea-govt-arrests-all-chinese-until-guineans-return-from-china-safely-video/
